object.name: ChecklistTask
object.description: Describes a task in a checklist.
object.rst_description: Describes a task in a checklist.

annotations.description: Special entities that appear in the task text
annotations.html_description: Optional. Special entities that appear in the task text
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Special entities that appear in the task text
annotations.name: text_entities

annotations.description: User that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a user
annotations.html_description: Optional. User that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. User that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a user
annotations.name: completed_by_user

annotations.description: Chat that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat that completed the task; omitted if the task wasn't completed by a chat
annotations.name: completed_by_chat

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the task was completed; 0 if the task wasn't completed
annotations.html_description: Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the task was completed; 0 if the task wasn't completed
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the task was completed; 0 if the task wasn't completed
annotations.name: completion_date
